attributes.review: when i first opened the app i was ecstatic to see my orange president but the first thing that popped up shocked me. it was a picture of donald trump himself doing unspeakable things to a donkey! i tried brushing it off because, ofc, the president is not racist nor sexist or anything so ofc i could forgive him! but no! i then noticed how outrageous these videos were of him eating eggplants and slapping mayonnaise so i had to delete the app. 0/10, i do not recommend ✨😚🤩🥰✨
